title: Purfect Painting Pose
summary: Pose practice that felt perfect for Hanekoma. Also haven't drawn him in a while! Pose reference Adorkastock's BlueSky post.

imgs.alt: Digital art of a man, Sanae Hanekoma from The World Ends With You, sitting on a stool with one foot on the seat, painting.

title: Why, oh Why...
summary:
Thinking about a certain someone.

Originally Null wasn't going to look this conflicted, just annoyed, but when they ended up that way, figured why not have an alternate embarrassed version.

I imagine when they are frustrated, they run their hand(s) through their hair. Bad negative moments they might tug on it, but generally running a hand through their hair is enough to help gather their thoughts. However, the less the hand(s) move, the more likely they are lost in thought and distracted.
details: (Father may or may not have used this knowledge to antagonize Null whoopies!)

imgs.alt: Waist up art of Null blushing with a hand in their hair with an ivy background.
Full body art of Null blushing with a hand in their hair over an ivy background.

title: Family For A Family
summary: Father completes a Jellyfish family for Chisa.

imgs.alt: Art of Father smiling and hugging a laughing Chisa. Chisa holds an orange jellyfish plushie with two smaller jellyfish in their tentacles. One smaller jellyfish is black and pink, and the other is brown and blue.

thumbnailAlt: Art of Father smiling and hugging a laughing Chisa. Chisa holds an orange jellyfish plushie with two smaller jellyfish in their tentacles. One smaller jellyfish is black and pink, and the other is brown and blue.

title: Null Heart!
summary: Playing around with drawing Null's face and hair, and putting some light colours over top. Started this around May 2024, finally finishing it a few months later.

imgs.alt: Art of Null, a masculine looking person, smiling with their hands held up forming a heart.

thumbnailAlt: Art of Null, a masculine looking person, smiling with their hands held up forming a heart.

title: Upset
summary:
Null comforts Chisa - gets a chance to be a parent for her. What is she upset about?
...Could very well be about Father. But also, here's more of Chisa's outfit! I'm thinking she'll wear jeans and then some sort of thinner, long sleeved shirt (maybe even fishnets) under a larger/looser sweater. She has Null's old scarf.

imgs.alt: Chisa cries into her hands, upset. Null sits on the ground, hands on her knees, to comfort her.

thumbnailAlt: Chisa cries into her hands, upset. Null sits on the ground, hands on her knees, to comfort her.

title: Father Sprite: Smug (2024/03)
summary: There was a Trans Day of Visibility hashtag/trend going around for trans artists to post their art (bonus if they were trans OCs!) so I put this together for Father. Nothing new but the background kinda is. The black rectangle ending up by Father's hand was by accident but I love it.

imgs.alt: Art of a man with long dark blonde hair tied back in a low loose pony tail. He's wearing a mixture of clothing types and colours with one gloved raised up. The glove is a reverse of an almost rainbow, which includes grey.

title: Father, using Windows 11 Paint
summary: From stream, using the natural pencil tool.

imgs.alt: A man with long blonde hair tied into a ponytail, winks and smiles, with his hands tucked into his orange patched coat flaring out around him. The text to the left says, "Made in Paint! (Win 11)". The text on the right has the names of each of the brush types written in that brush: "brush, airbrush, calligraphy brush, calligraphy pen, oil brush, crayon, marker, natural pencil, watercolor". It's signed "GramophoneTurtle".

title: A Supportive Trans Parent
summary: For those that need it: Father is here for you.

imgs.alt: Digital art of a smiling, chibi style man called Father wearing transgender color gloves and pointing to "Trans Rights!" written in the transgender flag colors.
A smiling, winking chibi style man called Father wearing transgender color gloves and pointing to "You're Amazing!" written in transgender colors.

A smiling, winking chibi style man called Father wearing transgender color gloves and pointing to "Be trans, do crimes" written in transgender colors, and below his arm in colors from Father's clothes "(against fashion)".
A smiling, winking chibi style man called Father wearing transgender color gloves and pointing to "I'm Proud Of You!" written in transgender colors.
A smiling, winking chibi style man called Father wearing transgender color gloves and pointing to "Trans Rights!" written in transgender colors.
A smiling, winking chibi style man called Father wearing transgender color gloves and pointing to "I Support You!" written in transgender colors.

title: Hanyakoma Hoodie!
summary: Based on the Cat Mario suit. When I originally posted this, it was the calico pattern only because but I wasn’t drawn to the default colours or just black and white, especially with the very strong red and blue lighting. However, when posting this now to other sites (2024 Oct.) it looks fine enough! I'm thinking that the red and blue lighting can help obscure the actual black and white pattern of the hoodie.

imgs.alt: Art of Sanae Hanekoma wearing a black and white cat hoodie, with red bars and blue bars on the sides lighting him up from behind.
Art of Sanae Hanekoma wearing a calico cat hoodie, with red bars and blue bars on the sides lighting him up from behind.

thumbnailAlt: Hanekoma wearing a black and white cat hoodie.

title: It felt like something was missing.
summary: From the Point of Origin by on AO3, part of the Learning Curve series.

imgs.alt:
A comic of Sho talking with Hanekoma in the cafe. “Yeah, whatever, dad…”  Sho freezes once he realizes what he's said.  
Hanekoma is in front of him. “What...did you call me?” Sho berates 
himself but is cut off.
The comic comtinues and Hanekoma hugs Sho tightly and Sho slowly returns the hug, both of them smiling, hugging and happy.

title: Phone Light
summary: At the time I wanted to clean this Joshua up but this was far as I got.

imgs.alt: Art of Joshua from The World Ends With You looking backwards with his phone raised up over his head. There is a beam of light coming down from above as his phone lights up.

thumbnailAlt: Art of Joshua from The World Ends With You looking backwards with his phone raised up over his head. There is a beam of light coming down from above as his phone lights up.
